subject: Human Growth Hormone
Football
lead_paragraph: Washington Redskins offensive tackle Jon Jansen will meet soon with N.F.L. officials to discuss his allegation that a number of players use human growth hormone and other performance-enhancing substances.
snippet: Washington Redskins offensive tackle Jon Jansen will meet soon with N.F.L. officials to discuss his allegation that a number of players use human growth hormone and other performance-enhancing substances.
